products.title: Boheme Azure Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Boheme azure roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
products.productdescription: An eye catching leaf print detailed in white on the chosen colour background. Available in other colours.

products.title: Boheme PVC Blackout Azure Blue Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Boheme pvc blackout azure blue roller blind in blue. Made to measure from 13.13 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Add a smart, contemporary finish to your chosen room with this appealing modern pattern. Featuring eye-catching curvaceous abstract leaves with a subtle white outline on a rich azure blue background, boheme pvc blackout azure blue double-sided blind is bound to gain many compliments. Flame retardant, this roller blind is made out of a blackout fabric, so it wont let light escape into your room, especially on a bright morning.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx1974 fabric colour: azure blue material: 3 ply vinyl, 1 ply fibreglass lining: pattern match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Boheme Azure (Moisture Resistant)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure boheme azure (moisture resistant) bathroom roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality bathroom roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 200mm max width: 3048mm
 	min drop: 200mm max drop: 2913mm
 	fabric joins: blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
 	Fabric composition: pvc
 	tube: robust aluminium tube
 	control: sidewinder or spring control
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included

products.title: Boheme Azure (Moisture Resistant)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure boheme azure (moisture resistant) blackout panel blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality blackout panel blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 600mm max width: 5000mm
 	min drop: 450mm max drop: 3500mm
 	composition: polyester
 	guarantee: 12 months

 	Controls: wand control attached to lead panel(s) to manually pull panels across.

 	Fixings: top fix or face fix brackets.

products.title: Boheme PVC Blackout Azure Blue Electric Roller Blind

products.productdescription:
Add a smart, contemporary finish to your chosen room with this appealing modern pattern. Featuring eye-catching curvaceous abstract leaves with a subtle white outline on a rich azure blue background, boheme pvc blackout azure blue double-sided blind is bound to gain many compliments. Flame retardant, this electric roller blind is made out of a blackout fabric, so it wont let light escape into your room, especially on a bright morning.
